text: allahu avareyellam orumiccu cerkkundinam avan parayum: "jinnsamuhame; manusyaril valare pere ninnal valipilappiccittunt.” appeal avarute atmamitrannalayirunna manusyar parayum: "nannalute natha! nannal parasparam sukhasvadanannalkk upayeagappetuttiyittunt. ippeal ni nannalkk anuvadicca avadhiyil nannalettiyirikkunnu”. allahu ariyikkum: sari, ini narakattiyan ninnalute tamasasthalam. ninnalavite sthiravasikalayirikkum. allahu icchicca samayamealike. ninre nathan yuktimanum ellam ariyunnavanum tanne; tircca
